snippet: The authorities say they are investigating whether the men were involved in the carjacking and fatal shooting of another livery driver this month.
abstract: New York law enforcement authorities arrest Takiem Ewing, Tyrone Felder and Kareem Martin in fatal shooting of Bronx livery driver Aboubacar Bah during carjacking, and are investigating their possible involvement in a similar case.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say they are investigating whether the men were involved in the carjacking and fatal shooting of another livery driver this month.

headline.main: 3 Arrested in the Killing of a Livery Driver in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: 3 Arrested in the Killing of a Driver in the Bronx
